𐀜 noᶱ ⇔ 𓂜 negative particle
𐀀-𐀜-𐀜 a-no-no "not subject to"
𐀀-𐀜 a-no ἄνευ without, ohne 𓂜𓈖 οὐδέν
𐀜-𐀟-𐀩-𐀁 no-pe-re-e useless

𐀜 purely phonetic Letter ‘no’
𐀒-𐀜-𐀰 "ko-no-so" "Knossos"
𐀕-𐀜 me-noˢ month
𐀒-𐀜 ko-noᶞ kind bush
𐀁-𐀑-𐀜 e-ki-no urchin porcupine
𐀁-𐀒-𐀕-𐀜 e-ko-me-no coming
𐀃-𐀜 o-no onager ANŠE 𒀲 donkeys
𐀆-𐀦-𐀜 de-qo-no “dejourno” > dinner
𐀑-𐀲-𐀜 ki-ta-no Kastanie? Pistacia
𐀪-𐀜 ri-no •λinon linen
𐀓-𐀖-𐀜 ku-mi-no cumin κύμινον; also abbreviated as ideogram KU
𐀳-𐀕-𐀜 te-me-no temple, sacred precinct
𐀺 -𐀜-𐀷-𐀴-𐀯 wo-no-wa-ti-si winegarden
𐁇-𐀜 pte-no •'foot-boards for mounting (chariots)' ⇔ πτέρνη 'heel'
𐀮-𐀪-𐀜 se-ri-no celery (𐀪 ler)
𐀵-𐀜 to-no throne ⇔ θρόνος •chair (Odyssey I 145+)
𐀵-𐀫-𐀜-𐀺-𐀒 to-ro-no-wo-ko •chair-maker(s) throne-worker

𐀶-𐀙-𐀜 tu-na-no •tunica? •a kind of textile

𐀹-𐀪-𐀜 wi-ri-no cow hides •ox-hides ⇔ ῥινός (Odyssey I 108+)
𐀷-𐀜 wa-no •name of ox (?)
𐀺-𐀜-𐀦-𐀰 wo-no-qo-so •name of ox ⇔ Οἴνοψ βόε οἴνοπε

ligature 𐀜 ˢ

𐀜's little ligature 'ˢ' is phonetically supported by
𐀕-𐀜 me-noˢ month Monat
